name: Snow Name
description:
How to play?

  • Use the left and right keys to control the players
  • Collect the square rings to score and prevent an avalanche =)
  • If you hit any tree, you die.

I hope you enjoy! And share your score in comments. 

Credits

  • Music from https://www.zapsplat.com
  • Fonts from https://www.1001fonts.com/
